title: Warning alerts v3: Create alert scoring schema for slippage & loss risk

sections.text: Define and implement the core risk scoring schema used to generate predictive slippage and loss-risk alerts, including required inputs (CRM fields, activity signals, Customer_Analyzer fit score) and normalized output (risk type, score, confidence). Add a minimal scoring implementation behind a feature flag with unit tests and clear documentation of assumptions. This ticket does not include driver ranking, recommendations, or UI rendering.
